title: Dai Yamato Zero-gou (Great Yamato No. 0)
synopsis: In the galactic group there are more than 100,000,000,000 galaxies, and the Milky Way galaxy, the one which includes Earth's solar system, is only one of these... one of many in the immensity of outer space.
staff: [['Katsumata, Tomoharu', ['Director']], ['Makino, Yukihiro', ['Episode Director', ' Storyboard']], ['Miyagawa, Hiroshi', ['Music']], ['Suda, Masami', ['Chief Animation Director']]]
